snippet.title: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix Trailer
snippet.description:
We're finally ready to announce what we've been working on! Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix is a full, CTGP-style sequel/refresh of Rhythm Heaven Megamix, featuring custom games, custom remixes, PORTED games from across the series, completely NEW games, and much, much more! 

Re-Megamix wouldn't be possible without the outstanding efforts of the entire Rhythm Heaven Megamix modding community, but Re-Megamix is primarily headed by  @Seanski2,  @TheAlternateDoctor and  @TownDarling. 

Join our Discord for updates! We're currently working on a demo, and being a part of our community means you'll be one of the first to play it! discord.gg/uWmChE4hgs
